content:
Hi All,
Does anyone know where I can get the extensional and intensional valuesets being referred to by Aegis Touchstone? There's 4 cases for extensional and 3 cases for intensional.

I tried to find these in tx.fhir.org but they don't seem to be there at least when I query by resource id (e.g. extensional-case-1).

I'm looking for the STU3 version and not R4.extensional and intensional valuesets used by Touchstone
Found these files in the GForge SVN (under tags). I'm assuming these are the ones unless someone else says otherwise.
With value sets, usually best to query by canonical URL as the ids can vary from server to server

Well I don't know the url for these test valuesets. But now that I've seen the files in Gforge, I tried to find one of them this time using the url e.g. 'http://www.healthintersections.com.au/fhir/ValueSet/extensional-case-3' and it's not showing up either.

So either the url has changed or tx.fhir.org doesn't contain these valuesets.

Again not a big deal since I already found the files and am assuming the .compose content hasn't changed.
svn is most up to date but I would have thought they'd be on tx.fhir.org. Unless @Richard Ettema has a more up to date source

@Michael Calderero The extensional and intensional valuesets used in the Terminology tests were originally created by Grahame when his server's url was 'http://www.healthintersections.com.au/fhir'. I simply used those existing valuesets when building out the TestScripts in Touchstone.
FYI - the latest/current versions of the connectathon files (TestScripts and fixtures) are now on Github at https://github.com/FHIR/documents.
Thanks for the link @Richard Ettema
